n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

c = [0] * n

for i in range(n):
	c[(a[i] + b[i]) % n] += 1

for i in range(1, n):
	c[i] += c[i-1]

ans = [0] * n

for i in range(n-1, -1, -1):
	ans[c[b[i]] - 1] = b[i]
	c[b[i]] -= 1

print(*ans)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    # print(n, a, b)
    c = [0] * n
    for i in range(n):
        c[i] = (a[i] + b[i]) % n
    # print(c)
    c.sort()
    for i in range(n):
        print(c[i], end=' ')

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = [0] * n
    for i in range(n):
        c[i] = (a[i] + b[i]) % n
    c.sort()
    print(*c)

main()

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

c = [0] * n

for i in range(n):
    c[(a[i] + b[i]) % n] += 1

for i in range(n):
    print(c[i], end=' ')

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

c = [(a[i] + b[i]) % n for i in range(n)]

b.sort()
print(*[b[i] for i in c])

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b.sort()
    c = []
    for i in range(n):
        c.append((a[i] + b[i]) % n)
    print(" ".join(map(str, c)))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

c = []
for i in range(n):
    c.append((a[i] + b[i]) % n)

c.sort()
print(*c)
